string.value: The Maple Administrator needs help settling an argument between Cake Boss Daniel and Pie Lord Tiara. It's gotten quite out of hand.
You have to help the Pie/Cake faction win their status as this year's MapleStory Anniversary official dessert! Go see Pie Lord Tiara/Cake Boss Daniel.
The Maple Administrator needs help settling an argument between Cake Boss Daniel and Pie Lord Tiara.
Oh my! Oh no! Things have totally spiraled out of control! You see, Cake Boss Daniel and Pie Lord Tiara have never gotten along. But I never imagined things would spiral so out of control!
I'll let you know your side.
No dessert for you then. Oh, come on. It'll be fun! You can win some awesome prizes, too!
